Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listeners often offer Bridging the Gap this important feedback, explaining that the radio broadcasts teach them the Word, which in turn draws them to church and to further study of God’s Word! This is the precise vision of Bridging the Gap – to broadcast God’s Word and to watch it work in the lives of people!

Bridging the Gap airs the Bible teaching of Pastor Lloyd Pulley, senior pastor of Calvary Chapel Old Bridge. The Bridging the Gap radio program began in 1994 with a shortwave broadcast airing Pastor Lloyd’s messages in Europe. Shortly after, the ministry began airing Pastor Lloyd’s teaching in the New York area. 

Since then, Bridging the Gap has expanded, airing Pastor Lloyd’s messages on stations throughout the United States, on the Calvary Old Bridge app, and via podcasts. In every aspect, the radio ministry has seen God fulfill His promise in Isaiah 55:11:

So shall My word be that goes forth from My mouth;
It shall not return to Me void, 
But it shall accomplish what I please, 
And it shall prosper in the thing for which I sent it.

Once enabled, you can listen to the most recent episode by saying, "Alexa, play Bridging the Gap."

To pause or resume any episode, say "Alexa, pause" or "Alexa, resume." To listen to previous episodes, say "Alexa, play the previous episode." If you want to know the title of an episode while the episode is playing, say "Alexa, ask Bridging the Gap for the title of this episode." If you want to know the air date of an episode, say "Alexa, ask Bridging the Gap for the date of this episode."
